TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ConfigurationProperty extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents an attribute or a child of a configuration element.

span.span: Represents an attribute or a child of a configuration element.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在一个简单的情况下，如`CustomSection`下一步的示例所示对象表示属性如`fileName`。In the case of a simple , such as the `CustomSection` shown in the next example, the objects represent attributes such as `fileName`. 对于更复杂的配置元素，如实例包含小节中，部分`authentication`、对象可以表示对象及其属性。In the case of more complex configuration elements such as a section containing subsections, for instance `authentication`, the objects can represent objects as well as attributes. 类表示的集合可以是任一属性的对象或配置元素的对象。The class represents the collection of the objects that can be either attributes or objects of a configuration element. 类表示单独的配置设置。The class represents an individual configuration setting. 此类，可获取或设置名称、 类型和特定配置实体 （属性或元素） 的默认值，并指定该属性是必需的、 是否为元素键，或表示默认的元素集合。This class allows you to get or set the name, type, and default value for a particular configuration entity (attribute or element) and specify whether the attribute is required, is an element key, or represents a default element collection. ## Examples 1. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用当创建自定义的部分。The following code example shows how to use the when you create a custom section. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty/CS/ConfigurationProperty.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty/VB/ConfigurationProperty.vb#1)] 下面是在前面的示例代码所使用的配置文件的摘录。The following is an excerpt of the configuration file used by the code in the previous example. 下面的示例演示如何在代码中创建上一节。The following example shows how to create the previous section in code. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty/CS/ConfigurationProperty.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty/VB/ConfigurationProperty.vb#30)]

span.para: 每个对象创建内部集合表示将元素属性或子元素的集合的对象。非自定义的信息和功能所包含提供对象属性。可用于以编程方式或声明性 （特性化） 编码模型创建自定义配置元素。 编程模型。此模型要求创建一个用于获取和/或将其值设置并将其添加到基础的内部属性包每个元素属性的属性基类。 声明性模型。此种比较简单的模型，也称为特性化的模型中，允许您通过使用的属性定义元素属性并与特性来修饰它。这些属性指示 ASP.NET 配置系统有关属性类型和其默认值。使用此信息，通过反射，获取 ASP.NET 配置系统为你创建元素属性对象，并执行所需的初始化。

Every object creates an internal collection of objects that represents either the element attributes or a collection of child elements. Non-customizable information and functionality is contained by an object provided by the property. You can use a programmatic or a declarative (attributed) coding model to create a custom configuration element. - Programmatic Model. This model requires that you create a property for each element attribute to get and/or set its value and add it to the internal property bag of the underlying base class. - Declarative Model. This simpler model, also called attributed model, allows you to define an element attribute by using a property and decorate it with attributes. These attributes instruct the ASP.NET configuration system about the property types and their default values. With this information, obtained through reflection, the ASP.NET configuration system creates the element property objects for you and performs the required initialization.
